member.name: CROSS_CERT_DIST_POINTS_INFO
member.summary: The CROSS_CERT_DIST_POINTS_INFO structure provides information used to update dynamic cross certificates.

member.name: CROSS_CERT_DIST_POINTS_INFO.dwSyncDeltaTime
member.summary: DWORD indicating seconds between synchronization. If this member is zero, the client default synchronization time is used.

member.name: CROSS_CERT_DIST_POINTS_INFO.cDistPoint
member.summary: Count of the number of elements in the rgDistPoint member array.

member.name: CROSS_CERT_DIST_POINTS_INFO.rgDistPoint
member.summary: Array of structures for distribution points for updating cross certificates.
